name: Stars
text: 0:0, Inspire 1.

name: Bone Knife
text: 0:0, your opponent discards their leftmost card.

name: Cog
text: 0:0, Build 1.

name: Crossed Bones
text: 1:2, Fleeting, create 2 copies of ${144} in your discard pile.

name: Dove
text: 1:1, Visible, Fleeting.

name: Juggle
text:
1:1.
When played, put the 3 leftmost cards in your hand on the bottom of your deck, then draw that many.
(Of the 3, your leftmost card will be closest to the top of the deck)

name: Drown
text: 1:1, discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Spy
text: 1:0, create a ${143} in your opponent's hand.

name: Sine
text: 2:4, Starve 4.

name: Dash
text: 2:3, Flare.

name: Swift
text: 2:2, Visible, if the next card costs 1, +1.

name: Crypt
text: 2:2, your last card in the story transforms into the top card in your discard pile with the same cost as it.

name: Gears
text: 2:0, Build 2.

name: Cosmos
text: 2:0, Inspire 1 + 1 for each card you play later this round.

name: Fishing Boat
text: 2:0, Tutor 1, Tutor 1, Tutor 1.

name: Factory
text: 3:0, Build X, where X is the number of cards later in the story.

name: Fruiting
text: 3:0, Nourish 3.

name: Gift
text: 3:3, both players draw 1.

name: Paranoia
text:
3:3.
When played, gain Sight X, where X is the number of cards before this in the story.

name: Hurricane
text: 4:0, set both players points to 0.

name: Dinosaur Bones
text: 4:5, Fleeting, create 3 copies of ${144} in your discard pile.

name: Mine
text: 4:4, remove from the game the top 4 cards of your discard pile.

name: Force
text: 5:6, Flare.

name: Tumulus
text: 5:4, +2 if your discard pile has at least 8 cards in it.

name: Uprising
text: 6:3, +1 for each card before this in the story.

name: Stalker
text:
X:4, where X is the number of cards in your opponent's hand.
(This card's base cost is 6)

name: Sarcophagus
text: 6:X, put the highest cost card from your discard pile on top of your deck, X is its cost.

name: Anubis
text: 7:7, costs 0 if you have at least 12 cards in your discard pile.

name: Horus
text: 7:7, costs 0 if you can see at least 3 of your opponent's cards in the story.

name: AI
text: 8:4, draw 1. Costs X less, where X is the total point value of all robots in your hand.

name: Oak
text:
8:8, if you win this round, convert to Nourish any excess points that you won by.
(For example, if you win 8 to 5 you get 2 points Nourish)

name: Enrage
text:
8:1, give each card later in the story -X, where X is its cost.
When played, give each card ealier in the story -X.

name: Bee
text: 0:1, Visible

name: Butterfly
text: 1:0, Nourish 1 (The next card you resolve is worth 1 more point)

name: Bandit
text: 1:2, create a ${146} in your opponent's hand

name: Night Vision
text: 1:0, Tutor 2. On play, Sight 3

name: Raise Dead
text: 2:2, put the top card of your discard pile on top of your deck

name: Bastet
text: 2:1, this card retains all changes to points as it resolves (For example, if this card was nourished by 3, it stays a 2:4 once it is in the discard pile)

name: Beehive
text: 2:0, swarm 3 (After your next draw step, create 3 ${126} in your hand)

name: Imprison
text: 2:0, set both players points to 0, then give your opponent 1 point for each card in their hand

name: Stable
text: 3:3, remove from the game and note the top card of your discard pile. This card's effect becomes to add a copy of the noted card to your hand.

name: Pelican
text: 4:4, remove from the game each card in your hand that costs 0 or 1. +1 for each card removed

name: Honey
text: 4:X, swarm X, where X is the number of rounds you have won

name: Beekeep
text: 5:5, remove from the game and note all 0-cost cards in your discard pile. This card's effect becomes to add to your discard pile a copy of each of the noted cards.

name: Foundry
text: 5:5-X, Build X, where X is the number of cards in the story before this card

name: Cuauhtli
text: 6:6, Nourish 2. When played, gain Sight 4 and transform each card in your hand into a ${19}

name: Icarus
text: 7:7, costs 0 if you have 5 cards in the story
